website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option that's ideal for modern decor and anyone who prefers a fuss-free design, but it won't work for every home.
pros: Sports a minimalist design with durable legs and a spacious top
Sleek wood veneers add natural wood look to strong hardwood foundation
cons: The contemporary looks are somewhat basic and may not look right in traditional homes

customer_reviews.title: It's a great design and made of wood
customer_reviews.text: So I own a home staging company and needed a round coffee table for a living room and found this. It's a great design and made of wood. Unfortunately it has a raised-line going through the entire length of the table top. Luckily I can cover it with some magazines. I would not recommend if you are using it for yourself or giving as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Nice table but poorly packaged and only received 3 legs.
customer_reviews.text: I love the table, but I needed to return 2 tables before getting one that was acceptable. The first package must have been a returned unit because the package was damaged and only came with 3 of the 4 legs. After returning it, the second package also came damaged and the the edge of the table was damaged. The 3rd table had a small dent in the middle but I was getting sick of returning them. I love the design and think the quality is decent, but they were packaged poorly and not handled carefully during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne  Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Looks way higher end than the price. I buy a lot of coffee tables in this price range, tons of them look as cheap as they are, but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: juannabie

customer_reviews.title: These used to be pretty good reproductions
customer_reviews.text: These used to be pretty good reproductions. They are not anymore. They are basically a flat piece of plywood with cheap veneer. The top doesn't even curve.
customer_reviews.author: RMambo

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it matches my herman miller chairs.. and I needed a quick fix for a coffee table. its nice wood, nice design (Eames), easy to assemble . This product would be great if the finish was a bit nicer - its splotchy, there are what to look like glue drips or some kind of adhesive discoloration on the edge of the plywood. but overall its a good table for 100 bucks - easy fit, good looking and it will last a long time. works for me
customer_reviews.author: pablo

customer_reviews.title: Great value and design
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Assembled easy. Looks great. I did add a generous coat of furniture wax
customer_reviews.author: Water_man1111

customer_reviews.title: Love the Style
customer_reviews.text: Love the profile, material & size. An excellent value. Purchased for a staging project and was disappointed to find a noticeable round dent on the top! The project had to be done on time, with no time to re order I had to keep... dent and all.
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty in person
customer_reviews.text: Love our coffee table. We needed something lightweight and not too bulky and this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dora

customer_reviews.title: stunning
customer_reviews.text: love love love it and so easy to assemble took every bit of three minutes and goes so well with my décor. the fedex shipper said they will be ordering one for themselves also.
customer_reviews.author: shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered two of those.....both had big marks, box was intact.
customer_reviews.author: Drijammal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I visited Design Within Reach and this is a pretty good match to their $1,200 coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It was damaged on the edge of the table box was crushed
customer_reviews.author: maverick

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality knock off
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on this table and was pleasantly surprised. There are lots of knock offs of this table out there, and this one is pretty good for the price. We'll see how it holds up, but out of the box I consider it an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Bird Lola

customer_reviews.title: Great value and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Looks just as advertised. Great value and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bott

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Eames reproduction table
customer_reviews.text: Quality, color, and parts are perfect. This table is better than expected. Assembling it was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Great table for a gal on a budget
customer_reviews.text: I love mid-century modern furniture, but I don't always have the budget for it. This table has been awesome. I waited a couple of months to write this review to see how the table would hold up. It's been terrific! For reference, I have a rough-and-tumble 2 1/2 yr old, a teenager, and a huge labradoodle puppy. We are rough on our furniture. This table looks great, had a nice weight, and it was super easy to assemble. I'm sure the original Eames version is much higher quality, but this is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: tturner

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Nice table, nice size and interesting leg details. I was unhappy with the big gash in the wood on the table top.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Burks

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the sloped edge is a bad design for a table edge....drinks fall over!....looks nice though
customer_reviews.author: Edward Van Ekeris

customer_reviews.title: A good looking, easy to assemble, sturdy and stain resistant coffee table.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking table if you only plan to use it to hold drinks, snack and such. The lip on the outer edge eliminates the ability to comfortably eat or work on a computer at this table. The assembly took 10 minutes maximum. The dark colored wood is rich and the finish truly does resist water stains and scratches. Overall good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: This came delivered to me damaged. The packaging was fine, but the lip of the top of the table was scraped and scratched -- as though someone accidentally buzzed part of it off with a drill bit. I'd think it was clearly a random thing it wasn't for how poorly made this is -- the paint/coat of color is so unevenly spread. Looks like a throw-away dud.
customer_reviews.author: RossPW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great copy for the money, easy to assemble in 5 minutes
customer_reviews.author: stephanie faison

customer_reviews.title: which was great! looks really good and expensive
customer_reviews.text: table was darker than anticipated, which was great! looks really good and expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but it arrived damaged. I can't be bothered with the postage and hauling it back, so I'll just live with it. But it was disappointing. They should package these a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Tickletext

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: If you love Eames designs but can't afford to pay for originals, this is a fantastic alternative. The table looks great and the quality is fantastic. Super fast shipping, well packaged, and easy to assemble. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Cute Modern Table
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, lightweight and great looking! I ordered a black version previously and there was a chip on the edge. This one looks perfect though! Highly recommend saving some money for retirement and purchasing this instead of the DWR $1058 version.
customer_reviews.author: J. Daigneault

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my coffee table and really love the quality! Looks just as beautiful as the original & very easy to assemble. Hopefully, it will be just as durable!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Lackey

customer_reviews.title: The table is perfect in every other fashion
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers stated, we also had to return two tables before getting one that wasn't damaged (dented/scratched). The table is perfect in every other fashion. Easy to assemble. Be advised the recessed top does make the usable surface area smaller than the true diameter of the top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Table came with a pretty decent ding in it
customer_reviews.text: Table came with a pretty decent ding in it, but otherwise was just as described. The quality of the plywood used in the table is slightly lower than that of the Eames Reproduction Lounge chairs they also produce. All said and done its a good looking table that costs slightly more than a sheet of plywood, which you can't beat.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Pacarro

customer_reviews.title: Great buy !
customer_reviews.text: It looks expensive and very mid century . I did see another one similar running upwards to 1k! I am lucky to run into this piece of furniture since I was having a difficult time staying under budget with my mid century decor . My piece came in good shape . Highly recommended !
customer_reviews.author: Alonso

customer_reviews.title: not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like this table a lot, I think it's really cute and fits in exactly how I want it to in my tiny NYC living room. My table arrived flawed and that's why I give it only 3 stars. There is strange dark streak that goes though part of the table top. I tired cleaning it off, but it's stuck there. To my fault, I never contacted the company because it seemed like too much of hassle to ship back and wait for a new table to arrive. Also the overall color was a bit darker than I expected. Picture not quite true to color.
customer_reviews.author: julie skowronski

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect coffee table for me! I've been looking for the table which has no glass and no sharp edges. No worries when my 4 and 3 years old boys play around it. It seems sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: SAC

customer_reviews.title: They have a great eye for design
customer_reviews.text: I've always admired LexMod products. They have a great eye for design. The table did not disappoint. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: Why pay a fortune when you can have this knock off. Love it, have gotten many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: kk West

customer_reviews.title: This one disappointed me
customer_reviews.text: The table itself looks cheap, none of the legs were even after many attempts to adjust them with the screws that hold it in place from underneath
customer_reviews.author: Stella&simon

customer_reviews.title: Good table, no hardware.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great table but be forewarned, it doesn't come with hardware. Not a big deal as your local hardware store has the needed hardware but can be a pain if you aren't expecting to go out and assemble it on your own.
customer_reviews.author: LutheranDude

customer_reviews.title: The style is spot on for a replica - very nicely done especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: The fit of the legs mounting under the table was a little less than precise, but the quality of the materials and hardware seems top notch. The style is spot on for a replica - very nicely done especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Table was solid and looks Great! All arrived on time and box was intact
customer_reviews.text: Table was solid and looks Great! All arrived on time and box was intact. I am very pleased with the table..
customer_reviews.author: Leslie McClain

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing, manufacturer has taken a month to send replacement screws for legs.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Loyd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As a stager, I will use this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

product_meta.title: Modway Plywood Coffee Table in Wenge
product_meta.description: Color:Wenge| Size:Coffee TableThis classic table's top and legs are shaped by molding thin wood veneers under heat and pressure. The molded plywood coffee table features eight-ply legs and three hardwood inner plies sandwiched between your choice of four natural face veneers. Set Includes: One - Plywood Coffee Table Product Dimensions: Overall Product Dimensions: 34"L x 34"W x 16"H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars55 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
